title: PBE Livestream: Ornn, today at 4 PM Pacific

replies.body: Report Rito, AFK for stream. Kappa
Bout time they get a taste of their own med-... "Policy"
Where is the stream?
So are you guys going to start or what? Reav3, did you forget that you should be streaming right now?

I first wanna shout out to everyone involved. The lore and design is the best I've ever seen in the game. The nod to how his past shaped much of the future is so nice. I'll be name changing just for this guy. Anyways, the question!

How big is Ornn compared to the rest of the world/other champs? Is he like a dwarf, or is he just scaled down in-game like Malphite? (This is partly for us cosplayers.) 

Bonus question: Do you guys intend on letting him have an option to be a jungler? (Like I know you guys dont like certain champs like Ali and Leona jungling, so I just thought I'd ask.)
Also, whats your view on his skill floor and skill ceiling? Is it all tied to his R in your opinion?

This is actually 2 questions, but what is Ornn if he isn't human? Also what can his Q actually block as it seems he can use it to cut off some ways of travel. Like the small opening next to raptors into lane.
I think Ornn is a Bear.

No. That's Volibear "So Ornn labored for ten days and built the single best door anyone had ever built. He adorned it with a ram’s head, like his own, and the one at the heart of the Freljord." That very same door ended up becoming Braum's shield I think.

Actually, Ornn is an ewok.
I mean, just look at that face lol
Ornn is a Ram God according to his lore
Ornn is a Ram God according to his lore
Ornn is a demigod which means a god or a godess having a child with a human lol.

Someday you guys should make farm skins, with "Little Lamb Ornn" "Calf Alistar" "Chicken Azir" and maybe even "Farmer Nasus"







rito pls

Did Ornn create the ram door that would eventually become Braum's shield? I only ask because the door was placed in a mountain, had the head of a ram, proved to be unbreakable, and was protecting a heap of gold, which was its original purpose in Ornn's lore, and the information seems to carry into Braum's lore.
Will he also destroy terrain created by allies ?

The Ornn stream has been cancelled today due to tech issues. 
It looks like there is a bigger issue with our stream set up, and we're going to burn on it and try not to reschedule. 
We know that this sucks, especially when you've been waiting around to see Ornn. Thanks for all of your patience and sticking with us through the difficulties

Thanks for pasting this here.
I wish they had updated the boards post as well as the linked announcement with the info.
They have already done that just refresh the page.
If you were in the stream for the past half hour you would get the joke.
we still getting a pbe update tonight or what
Or not...
Just wanna say that RIOT BE ON TIME!!!
It's tomorrow; they moved it due to tech issues.  Refresh this page.
Late. {{item:3070}}
Late
Yeah the stream isn't on right now. What's up guys???{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
Why do you never do what you say you will?
Does Ornn have yordle blood?
Will he also destroy ally made terrain? Or just enemy made terrain?
When is Ornn coming out on pbe? I live in California for time zone purposes.
Riot, I just want to say, your breaking my heart{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

Excuse me riot, I found a spelling error in your new story about Ornn, in the fifth story where Ornn and Voli are fighting, it should say "lightning strikes" not "lighting strikes" ~ just trying to help <3{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} I took a screen shot if needed.

https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/330526954480599041/344972902929530880/2017-08-09_3.png
We need u to give us more info pls reschedule
how to joint with PBE ?
Riot said the stream is rescheduled for tomorrow same time

This may be a weird idea but it might be fun to create another mini-game like the Blitzcrank poro grabber. The new mini-game could possible be Ornn blacksmithy shop. I just want to know if you are going to create another minigame.<3
dang man, this is like the third canceled or majorly delayed stream in a row ;--;
Postponed to tomorrow :(
Wow thanks riot ;)
Guys, give Riot a break, they're a small indie game company, they aren't used to this kind of pressure {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Final Question: Is this a God Ram? (TuTom is the name of my 3.0 PoE Character, were you a bear?)
Question 2: Can Talon jump over his terrain? (The little things matter?)
Question 1: Are there "Boing" sounds? (It's an AC-DC question.)
What do the upgrades actually do the items they apply to?
Increase the stats by a medium amount I'm guessing. As they all have passives (I think) probably buffs the passive a bit.

Questions:  

1)  Will Orrn's passive work in Aram?
2)  What are the stat upgrades on the items that the team can buy?
3)  Do you think that Orrn will be able to be a support?

1) Unknown. But expect some bugs probably.
2) Probably improved by a medium amount.
3) Yes, but not like a normal support, as a 2nd or 3rd possible role. somewhat like sion-ish.

I will keep you updated when he comes out on pbe.
what role is ornn?
Tank it seems like. Toplaner probably, maybe jungle but that won't allow him to use his upgrade to sunfire cape.
